You reach out and place your hands on the black orb, concentrating deeply as you do so. You feel your mind escaping from your body, flowing into the black orb. Like stepping out of a portal, you find yourself at a farmyard in southern Lebennin west of Pelargir. You see a middle-aged woman who is out looking for her pig which has once again have escaped its pen. Nearby, a farm hand grumbles to himself. Your vision becomes blurry, and you return to your body with a jerk, instinctively removing your hands from the orb.
